Hackathon on rails!

Join us for a 2000km train ride through the beautiful Swedish landscape together with 47 other hackers and work on making public transport better.

Welcome

Trainhack 2017 will start 2017-09-07 in Gothenburg at 18:00 and continue to Uppsala through Luleå. We will travel 2000km and arrive in Uppsala on the 9th of September around lunch time.

We will soon send more details to the travellers who have already booked a ticket to connecting journeys.

If you have any questions, contact us on hello@trainhack.com or call Martin at 46elks 0723-175800

About Trainhack

The purpose of Trainhack is to create a unique, challenging, and fun hackevent for developers, where the journey focuses on creating digital services that make travelling with public transport easier and a more positive experience.

Event details

We start in Gothenburg at 18:00 and we end the trip in Uppsala around lunch on the 9th. The route will pass Luleå where we will make a stop for activities and food.

All hackers will have their own bed to sleep in, if you want - sleep the entire event. Hopefully not everyone will spend the entire time sleeping, but rather spending time on their projects.

There will be wifi onboard all the way, as well as local server for git repos m.m. this is supplied by Icomera

All hackers will be invited to a Slack team, where you can find new teammates or exchange ideas. You may also work on a project by yourself.



Public transit API's and open data

Thre is plenty of resources to make the development of your project possible. Here is a list of APIs from Public transit companies and agencies.

  • Trafiklab - Public transit API and data
  • Map data from Trafikverket
  • Västtrafik's developer portal
  • Skånetrafiken's developer portal

Other types of APIs and open data that may be usefull:

  • 46elks - SMS, Calls & MMS-API.
  • Taxi Stockholm - Taxi booking API.
  • Öppnadata - Consolidation point of open data.
  • HackForSweden - List of open data.
  • Sveriges Radio - API with image, pods, etc..
  • Masterpaper about nighttrains.

Themes for projects

Since we will be onboard a nightrain during the event, themes will often connect to this. All prizes and themes are not yet set, however here are some samples for inspiration:

  • Offline

    Since nighttrains often lack propper 3G/4G reception, offline solutions will often be useful. What would the best offline solution be?

  • Virtual Reality

    The reality on a train may not allways be perfect, why not have a private cinema in VR? SJ AB will be upgrading current nighttrain wagons, would you like to show how great that could be?

  • Internet of Things

    On the trains today the amount of tech close to the travellers is very limited. Why not have a RFID tag on each seat to let the passengers check in with their phones? Is it possible to detect free seats with simple IoT devices at a low cost?

  • Planning support

    Today whenever there is an issue on the railroad it takes very long to redirect trains on tracks that are still open. How can this process become faster? Perhaps a complete trainsystem simulator that can show all the events that will occur when the timetable is changed.

  • Entertainment

    How to pass the time when travelling? A team created a game during Trainhack 2016 that asked questions about the current position of the train. What would be a fun game, unique to play on a train?

  • Sleep tight

    What can technology do to make it easier to sleep on a night train? Perhaps it´s sound canceling headphones, whale music, a blindfold, or is it to prevent the nighhtmare of not waking up at your station, that helps you sleep like a baby?

  • Travel options

    I dag så presenteras resor utifrån tidtabellen och de snabbaste resorna presenteras. Om den snabbaste resan är fullbokad så visas inte alternativa lösningar för resenären. När man bokar nattåg presenteras alternativ med byte på natten upp då det ger kortare restid, men att sova 8 timmar och komma fram lite senare kan ju vara mycket bättre. Hur skulle man kunna presentera olika alterantiv på ett bra sätt?

  • Disruption management

    In situations when traffic does not work properly, different buses, trains, taxis will take care of the passengers. Often there is no easy way to know where different vehicles are located or an easy way to contact them. You can give drivers access to an app / web service / SMS solution that makes it easier to keep track of the information.

  • More detailed travel / train information

    Today, it can be hard to know where to stand on the platform when the train comes and to know when the train arrives. Where exactly does the wagon stop, which vehicle is coming, How many meters away is the train now? How can GPS information from the train be used to give travelers more accurate travel information? How do the train usually run, how do you report historical delay statistics for a particular route or departure so that you as a customer can reduce your risk of delays.

  • Efficient work for train companies

    Solutions that allow ticket checks to be handled by the travelers themselves, automatic rebooking in case of traffic disruption, automatic refunds when the train is delyed, overview of booked seats etc, ticketless travel - travel with RFID cards, Aztek, QR, SMS, MMS, Barcode, Driving license, ID card, Passport, etc., report malfunctions in wagons such as cleaning or broken details. How would it be to book trips inside online callers or on facebook?
